title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 140.5 - State and federal fund allotments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 140.5 - State and federal fund allotments

State Regulations

The allotment of special quotas from State funds as
provided by article 23 of the Education Law, and from Federal funds as provided
in the New York State Plan for Vocational Education, will be made by the

Commissioner of Education to each county vocational education and extension
board, in the annual apportionment of such funds, only when the provisions of
law and the regulations as herein provided have been met by such
board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
140.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
